blur_detection.description: The receipt shows clear, sharp text with well-defined edges and excellent focus throughout the document.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as the image clarity is excellent for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The receipt exhibits excellent contrast with dark black text on a light cream/white background allowing for easy readability.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No improvement needed as the current contrast is optimal for text extraction.

glare_identification.description: No significant glare or reflections are present on the receipt surface that would impact text readability.
glare_identification.recommendation: No action required as the lighting conditions when capturing the image were appropriate.

water_stains.description: No water damage, discoloration, or staining is visible on the receipt paper.
water_stains.recommendation: No action required as the document appears to be in pristine condition regarding water damage.

tears_or_folds.description: The receipt shows minor creasing or slight folding but all text remains completely legible.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: No action needed as the minor creasing does not impact data extraction capabilities.

cut_off_detection.description: The entire receipt is visible within the frame with no content cut off at the edges.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: No adjustment needed as the image captures the complete document.

missing_sections.description: The receipt appears complete with header, line items, total, and footer information all clearly visible.
missing_sections.recommendation: No action required as all standard receipt sections are present and accounted for.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows, or objects obstruct any part of the receipt content.
obstructions.recommendation: No action needed as the image is free from obstructions.
